title: Island of Flowers
description: Amaryllis: PrideLaine Simmons had traveled to Hawaii to reconcile with her long-estranged fatherâ€”only to be accused by his handsome young business partner of having ulterior motives. How dare Dillon O'Brian interfere in her family affairs . . . and have the nerve to set her heart aflame whenever he came near?
author: Nora Roberts
